long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
2048 Cupcakes Offline Version (Less than 1MB) - 100% Offline, NO ADS & Free to play!

Play 2048 Cupcakes on your Google Chrome Browser. Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same cupcake touch, they merge into a bigger different cupcake!

1. Install extension
2. Click the 2048 Cupcakes  icon on the Chrome extension toolbar 
and then we will open a 2048 Cupcakes  for you to play the game! You donâ€™t need to do anything else! You also can play 2048 Cupcakes  from any Chrome Tab.
Have fun!
